title: Purported Arrow Lake Refresh CPUs might bring extra performance with no price premium â€” early retailer listings show practically no price hike for some Core Ultra 200K Plus chips
summary: An overseas retailer has listed Intel's forthcoming Core Ultra 200K Plus (codenamed Arrow Lake Refresh) processors along with pricing, suggesting that the refreshed family will carry practically no premium over existing products.
